data.title: Broad Town: Christ Church
data.meta_description:
Welcome to Christ Church, Broad Town. Please look at our links on the left hand side of the page to see our weekly sheet with prayer requests and readings, times of church services and other events.

Everyone is welcome to our services, if you are new to church, or new to our area, you may like to use our link about Jargon Busting to choose a service which is best for you. 

Keep in touch by using this website, our weekly sheets and the Lyneham and Woodhill Facebook Page.
data.text:
Hilmarton: St Laurence

Welcome to St Laurence, Hilmarton. Please look at our links on the left hand side of the page to see our weekly sheet with prayer requests and readings, times of church services and other events.

Everyone is welcome to our services, if you are new to church, or new to our area, you may like to use our link about Jargon Busting to choose a service which is best for you.

Keep in touch by using this website, our weekly sheets and the Lyneham and Woodhill Facebook Page.

We are also an Inclusive Church, please read are news story to find out more.

Welcome to St Peter's Church, Clyffe Pypard. Please look at our links on the left hand side of the page to see our weekly sheet with prayer requests and readings, times of church services and other events.

Everyone is welcome to our services, if you are new to church, or new to our area, you may like to use our link about Jargon Busting to choose a service which is best for you.

Keep in touch by using this website, our weekly sheets and the Lyneham and Woodhill Facebook Page.

Everyone is welcome to our services, if you are new to church, or new to our area, you may like to use our link about Jargon Busting to choose a service which is best for you.

Keep in touch by using this website, our weekly sheets and the Lyneham and Woodhill Facebook Page.

Lyneham: St Michael

Welcome to St Michael and All Angels, Lyneham. Please look at our links on the left hand side of the page to see our weekly sheet with prayer requests and readings, times of church services and other events.

Everyone is welcome to our services, if you are new to church, or new to our area, you may like to use our link about Jargon Busting to choose a service which is best for you.

Please note that all our services are being held in the Church Hall until further notice.

Keep in touch by using this website, our weekly sheets and the Lyneham and Woodhill Facebook Page.

Welcome to St Mary's Church, Bradenstoke. Please look at our links on the left hand side of the page to see our weekly sheet with prayer requests and readings, times of church services and other events.

Everyone is welcome to our services, if you are new to church, or new to our area, you may like to use our link about Jargon Busting to choose a service which is best for you.

Keep in touch by using this website, our weekly sheets and the Lyneham and Woodhill Facebook Page.
